name: Incandescence
description:
Made in 3 days for Zeno Jam 5, Theme: Light Attracts Bugs

IMPORTANT NOTES:

-game MUST be fullscreened in order to continue past tutorial

-CLICK left mouse button to shoot, not hold

Defend yourself from creatures in the dark of night! Playing as the Firefly Warden, crank your lantern to draw fireflies to your side, and send them out towards enemies to defeat them. Survive for as long as you can in the perilous night.

Keep in mind that this game makes use of sudden loud noises, which can be shocking to the player.

Production/Sound: Jebadiah01

Art/Animation: bugfellow

Programming/Design: Ser_Junkan, limegreenicy

Outsourced sound assets:

  • Freesound
    • hasali, breviceps, InspectorJ, Rvgerxini, klankbeeld, drowsyprincess, mrsorbias, antoineopeng, NaturesTemper, Robinhood76, Animaldierer, rodincoil, Patrick_Corra, tbsounddesigns, MortisBlack, luminousfridge
  • Pixabay: SamuelFrancisJohnson
  • Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com
